price: Ellos fueron apartados de la misericordia de Dios, y a quien Dios aparta de Su misericordia no tendrá quién lo socorra.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَن يَلۡعَنِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ نَصِيرًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu waman yalʿani al-lahu falan tajida lahu naṣīran
